name: Space Station Escape (Werdna821)
description:
This is my project 3 for CAS 117 at Michigan State University

I have modified my 2D platformer to be different from the tutorial.

1.I added new background music to the main menu and each level.

2.I made an entire level  to the game.

3. The victory screen, lose screen, pause screen, all have a different color theme.

4.The main menu is completely redesigned from the original with new music, colors, and background features.

5.The players health settings have been changed to make it more challenging for the player.

6.The new name of the game is Space Station Escape.

7.Level 2 was changed around to not look like the tutorial.

Credits:

Created by Andrew Jamison

Michigan State University

https://freesounds.org
